root.name: Order of War
root.description: Overview Set during the invasion of Normandy in 1944, Order of War follows the allied forces through the invasion of Europe from the side of the US in Operation Overlord and the Soviet Red Army in Operation Bagration as the player takes command in effort of pushing the German troops back into Berlin involving gameplay very similar to that of World in Conflict. Multiplayer The original 2009 release of Order of War did not come packaged with a multiplayer, however in March 2010 a stand-alone multiplayer known as Order of War: Challenge was released as a digital download on Steam, in order to maximize profits from the game, essentially the PC equivalent of charging for "DLC" that's already on the disc.System Requirements Minimum:OS: Windows® XP SP2/Windows Vista SP1/Windows 7 Processor: 3.0 GHz, DUO 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB Graphics: 256MB NVIDIA GeForce 7600/Radeon HD2400 DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c Hard Drive: 10 GB free space Recommended:OS: Windows® XP SP2/Windows Vista SP1/Windows 7 Processor: DUO 3.2 GHz or better Memory: 3 GB or better Graphics: 512MB GeForce 9800/Radeon HD4850 or better DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c Hard Drive: 10 GB free space Note: Increased performance will be noticed on an Alienware Area 51® X58 Desktop
